metadata.title: CVE-2023-1299 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise 1.5.0 allow a job submitter toescalate to management-level privileges using workload identity and taskAPI. Fixed in 1.5.1.

criterions.comment: nomad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
